input.name: New Password
input.narrative: If this is your first login it will prompt you to change the password.

input.name: Prevent Registration of New Resources Flag
Enable Unicode for Session Logs Flag
Set 'Allow latest Runtime Resource screen capture'
Allow latest Runtime Resource screen capture Flag
Prevent Registration of New Resources Flag
Enable Unicode for Session Logs Flag
Set 'Allow latest Runtime Resource screen capture'
Allow latest Runtime Resource screen capture Flag

resource.action: Control Room - Get Resource Screen Capture

exception.detail: "User Without View Resource Screenshot permission could view screenshot"

input.name: Name
input.narrative: The name of the process to publish

input.name: Port
input.narrative: The port number on which the resource PC should listen

input.name: SSO
input.narrative: True to login using Active Directory authentication. If this is False and Username is empty, a public resource PC is started

input.name: Username
input.narrative: The username to use for the resource PC. Ignored if SSO is True. If this is empty and SSO is False, this will create a public resource

input.name: Password
input.narrative: The password to use for the resource. Only used if Username is given

output.name: Process ID
output.narrative: The PID of the newly created process

stage.name: Note1
stage.narrative:
The machine name was hardcoded as "BPWIN7_debug" and as a result, the result of this decision stage will always be 'No' when process is running on machines other than BPWIN7_debug.
Changed the expression from: [Machine Name]="BPWIN7_debug" to InStr(Upper(Trim([Machine Name])), Upper("_debug")) > 0
To look for the term _debug within the Machine Name.

input.name: Role Permissions
input.narrative: Collection containing nodes and values for child nodes (check/unchecl)

input.name: Name
input.narrative: The name of the process to publish

input.name: Port
input.narrative: The port number whose resource should be stopped

field.name: Parent Node
field.description: Name of the parent node you wish to set a permission on

field.name: Child Node
field.description: Name of the node you wish to set a permission on

input.narrative: If this is your first login it will prompt you to change the password.

input.name: Username
input.narrative: The name of the user you wish to delete.

input.name: Role Name
input.narrative: Name of the Role to be deleted.

input.narrative: Name of the tree to be extended.

input.name: Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the item to be clicked on.

input.name: Select Item Method?
input.narrative: True by Default. Selects the node from system tab using Select Item approach. If the node is not available (Greyed out) an exception will be thrown. Use this method if you are certain the node is available for selection.

input.name: Retry MouseClick?
input.narrative: Default to True. Retries Global Mouse Click up to 3 times.

input.name: Tab Name
input.narrative: Name of Tab to Click

calculation.expression: [Total Resources] & "Name: " & [Availabe Resources.Name] & ", " & "State: " & [Availabe Resources.State] & ", " & "Session Info: " & [Availabe Resources.Session Info] & ", " & "Members: " & [Availabe Resources.Members] & ", " & "Connection: " & [Availabe Resources.Connection] & ", " & "Latest Connection Massage: " & [Availabe Resources.Latest Connection Message] & NewLine() & NewLine()

exception.detail: "Encountered Exception: " & [Exception Detail] & NewLine() & NewLine() & "And list of resources found: " & NewLine() & [Total Resources]

input.name: Process Name
input.narrative: The name of the process of interest - if it is not found, the 'Ungrouped Processes' group will be opened and checked

input.name: Resource Name
input.narrative: The name of the Resource PC on which to create the session

input.name: Group to Expand
input.narrative: Default value is 'Default'.

input.name: Negative Test
input.narrative: Check for negative testing

input.name: Resource Group to Expand
input.narrative: Default value is 'Default'

output.name: Position of Pending Session
output.narrative: The 1-based index of the newly created session in the Environment list in Control Room

input.name: Tab Name
input.narrative: Name of Tab to Click

input.name: Session Position
input.narrative: The 1-based index of the session of interest, in the Environment list

input.name: Process Name
input.narrative: The expected process name of the session of interest. This will be double checked before starting the session at the specified position.

input.name: Resource Name
input.narrative: The expected resource name of the pending session of interset. This will be double checked before starting the session

input.name: Session Status
input.narrative: The expected status of the session. This will be double checked.

input.name: Scheme Name
input.narrative: The name in which you want to call your encrpytion scheme.

input.name: Available?
input.narrative: This will tick a box that allows the encryption scheme to become available.

input.name: Database?
input.narrative: Mark as true if you want to store the scheme on the database. Please note that this will default to true.

input.name: Method
input.narrative: The encryption method used with the scheme.

input.name: Retry MouseClick?
input.narrative: Default to True. Retries Global Mouse Click up to 3 times.

input.name: Clean Up?
input.narrative: False by Default. Set True if clean up is required at the beginning of the Action.
